# distances

**Interface Property**

The system of measurement that displays on the map.

## Declaration

```swift
distances?: Distance;
```

## Discussion

Sets the system of measurement for displaying map distances. See [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Distance] for accepted values.

This property applies to the scale, if it displays. The default value is [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Distance/Adaptive], which means that the measurement system depends on the map’s set [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/MapKitInitializationOptions/language]. This property affects displayed distances only; it doesn’t affect data that returns from a service, such as [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Directions].
